law.catch_line: Projects exempt from KRS 56.440 to 56.540 and KRS 45A.045.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 56.440 to 56.540 and KRS 45A.045 shall be construed to apply to any project undertaken by the authority pursuant to KRS 441.625 to 441.695.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 66, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, H, 5, c, (2) at 651.
